duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and program control systems, PLC, and SCADA applications for industrial automation.
Read P&IDs and other engineering documents to specify process instrumentation and recommend control system designs.
Work independently and with an engineering team to develop high-level and detailed design of industrial control systems.
Report job activity, maintain detailed logs, and identify opportunities for improvement of work products and standards.
Meet deadlines, work on multiple projects with minimum supervision, and maintain a high standard of work performance.
Communicate directly with clients, suppliers, and upper management to ensure work is in accordance with the drafting standards of the company and client.

education_certification.credential: Associates and Bachelor’s Degree/Technical Degree preferred, namely in Engineering. Equivalent work experience will also be considered.
